participant_1.background:
I read my favorite book Twilight on the beach while on vacation.
i used to work as an actress.
i also dance and sing.
my favorite food is sushi.
I enjoy my quiet life and green tea.

participant_2.background:
I try new things to keep myself young.
I picked up my guitar and started playing.
i have a strange obsession with pens.
I always end up staring at my antique collection for hours.
My family eats healthy, goes for walks, and enjoys the Fourth of July together.

content.text: Hi there! I just got back from vacation. I read my favorite book Twilight on the beach. It was so good.
Oh wow! I've heard that's a really good book. I'm not much of a reader myself, but I do like to try new things to keep myself young. I recently picked up the guitar and started playing.
That's awesome! I used to play the guitar when I was younger, but I haven't played in ages. I miss it.
You should start playing again! It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to relax.
I know, I know. I really should. I'll see if I can find my old guitar.
Good luck! I'm sure you'll have a lot of fun.
Thanks! So what do you like to do for fun?
I love to go for walks with my family. We always end up walking for hours, talking and laughing. We also have a lot of fun together on the Fourth of July. We always grill out and enjoy the fireworks.
That sounds like so much fun! I love spending time with my family too. We always go out for sushi on my birthday. It's our tradition.
Sushi sounds delicious! I've never had it before.
You should definitely try it! It's my favorite food.
I'll have to do that. Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! Have you ever been to the beach?
I have! I love the beach. I love swimming and sunbathing.
Me too! I love the feeling of the sand between my toes.
Me too! It's so relaxing.
So what are you up to today?
Not much. Just hanging out at home.
Me too. I'm going to make some tea and relax.
That sounds like a good plan. I'm going to do the same.
Great! Have a good day!
You too
